name: Zillertaler Weisenbläser Horn Blower's Meet
description:
Participants: 
 
brass bands from the Zillertal music bands, South Tyrolean Tanzlmusig, Stualausmusig, Zillertaler Weisenbläser, Thierseer Alphornbläser, Afelder Dreigesang and singers and musicians from near and far.
Start: 09.30 a.m.
From 9.30 a.m. to 12.00 p.m. hike from the Gasthof Thanner to the festival area at Steinerkogl
12.00 p.m. mountain mass framed by the Weisenbläser
Then open singing and making music throughout the day.
Picturesque festival area in the middle of a
beautiful nature- and mountain scenery, Zillertaler Krapfen, Melchermuas ......
From 8.30 a.m. regular free-of-charge shuttle service (only in the case of beautiful weather) from Hippach train station via Horbergbahn, train station and municipal office Mayrhofen.
In case of bad weather, a bad weather festival will take place at the covered festival area at the music bandstand.
Free admission!
For further information contact 0664/2448030 or 0664/2613311 and www.bmk-brandberg.atOr at the tourist office Mayrhofen-Hippach Tel. 05285/6760
